Posts.Content: diana1972 wrote: Hello everyone just had my first chemo treatment on Oct 7th and noticed while at work today after having some cramping in the back of my legs a large red rash behind my knees and on my feet. Anyone else have this? Called Dr and Patient Navigator but haven't received any call backs yet. It doesn't itch or hurt just had some leg cramping. Log in to post a reply
